EmailTemplate.name: Valentine's Deals North Jersey
EmailTemplate.subject: Introducing 10 days of hometown Valentine's deals
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This Valentine's Day, DealChicken will be hatching 10 days of hometown Valentine deals.
From February 4-13, DealChicken's 10 days of hometown Valentine deals can help you share the love with your customers. For more information, read our 10 days of hometown Valentine deals information sheet.
To learn more about how your business can grow this Valentine's Day, contact {!Contact.OwnerFullName} at {!Contact.OwnerEmail} or {!Contact.OwnerPhone}.
DealChicken alerts consumers to great deals. Consumers purchase the deal on DealChicken.com and redeem at your location or website. Merchants receive 50% of total sales less a 2.5% credit card processing fee.
Why try DealChicken? Hear how DealChicken can transform your business and bring in new, high-quality customers
